artefact: Registration of independent health care service (England and Wales)

artefact.overview: You need to register with the Care Quality Commission or Healthcare Inspectorate to run an independent health care service (eg private hospital or clinic) in England and Wales
artefact.licence_short_description: Register to run an independent health care service (eg private hospital or clinic) in England and Wales.
artefact.licence_overview: To operate an independent health-care service such as a private hospital or clinic, you need to register with the [Care Quality Commission (CQC)](http://www.cqc.org.uk/ "Care Quality Commission (CQC)"){:rel="external"} in England or the [Healthcare Inspectorate Wales (HIW)](http://www.hiw.org.uk/ "Healthcare Inspectorate Wales (HIW)"){:rel="external"} in Wales.

details.description: Applying for licences from your council for events and businesses
Information about starting up and running a business in the UK, including help if you're self employed or a sole trader.
